description: United States is in talks with Canada and other allies globally to further restrict Moscow's energy revenue by imposing a price cap on Russian oil without causing spillover effects to low-income countries, Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said on Monday.
title: U.S. in talks with allies on Russian oil price cap, says Yellen - Reuters
